data.name: AfricanCuisine
data.value: African Cuisine

data.name: AfricanCuisine_Description
data.value: Varied dishes focusing on stews, grains, and root vegetables, often seasoned with unique local spices (e.g., Jollof Rice (Nigeria), Injera (Ethiopia), Bobotie (South Africa), Tagine (Morocco), Biltong (South Africa), Fufu (Ghana)).

data.name: AsianCuisine
data.value: Asian Cuisine

data.name: AsianCuisine_Description
data.value: A diverse range of flavors from East and Southeast Asia, featuring rice and noodle dishes (e.g., Sushi (Japan), Pho (Vietnam), Pad Thai (Thailand), Dumplings (China), Ramen (Japan), Satay (Indonesia)).

data.name: BakedGoods
data.value: Baked Goods

data.name: BakedGoods_Description
data.value: A wide range of breads, pastries, and sweets that are enjoyed as snacks or desserts (e.g., Croissants (France), Bagels (United States), Scones (United Kingdom), Danish Pastry (Denmark), Brownies (United States), Puff Pastry (France)).

data.name: DessertsSweets
data.value: Desserts & Sweets

data.name: DessertsSweets_Description
data.value: A variety of sweet treats and desserts, showcasing flavors and techniques from around the world (e.g., Tiramisu (Italy), Baklava (Turkey), Mochi (Japan), Crème Brûlée (France), Churros (Spain), Dulce de Leche (Argentina)).

data.name: EuropeanCuisine
data.value: European Cuisine

data.name: EuropeanCuisine_Description
data.value: Traditional and modern dishes from various European countries, emphasizing fresh ingredients and unique cooking styles (e.g., Pasta (Italy), Ratatouille (France), Paella (Spain), Sauerbraten (Germany), Borscht (Ukraine), Fish and Chips (United Kingdom)).

data.name: FastFoodComfort
data.value: Fast Food & Comfort

data.name: FastFoodComfort_Description
data.value: Quick meals that are typically easy to prepare and satisfy cravings (e.g., Fried Chicken (United States), Pizza (Italy), Fish and Chips (United Kingdom), Nachos (Mexico), Doner Kebab (Turkey), Cheeseburger (United States)).

data.name: FusionCuisine
data.value: Fusion Cuisine

data.name: FusionCuisine_Description
data.value: Innovative dishes that blend ingredients and cooking techniques from different cultures (e.g., Korean Tacos (United States), Sushi Burritos (United States), Indian Pizza (India), Thai Curry Pizza (United States), Mediterranean Burrito (Global), Banh Mi Burger (Vietnam)).

data.name: GrilledBarbecue
data.value: Grilled & Barbecue

data.name: GrilledBarbecue_Description
data.value: Dishes that are cooked over an open flame or grill, celebrated for their smoky flavors (e.g., BBQ Ribs (United States), Tandoori Chicken (India), Grilled Fish (Global), Satay (Indonesia), Grilled Vegetables (Mediterranean), Charcoal-Grilled Meat (Korea)).

data.name: HomeCookedTraditional
data.value: Home-Cooked Traditional

data.name: HomeCookedTraditional_Description
data.value: Family-style meals that reflect cultural heritage and comfort, often made with love (e.g., Roast Chicken (United States), Lasagna (Italy), Curry (India), Borscht (Ukraine), Meatloaf (United States), Goulash (Hungary)).

data.name: IndianSouthAsian
data.value: Indian & South Asian

data.name: IndianSouthAsian_Description
data.value: Spicy and flavorful dishes, often centered around rice and bread, using a variety of spices (e.g., Biryani (India), Daal (Pakistan), Curry (Bangladesh), Samosas (India), Butter Chicken (India), Chaat (India)).

data.name: LatinAmerican
data.value: Latin American

data.name: LatinAmerican_Description
data.value: Vibrant and flavorful foods reflecting the diverse cultures of Central and South America (e.g., Tacos (Mexico), Empanadas (Argentina), Feijoada (Brazil), Arepas (Venezuela), Ceviche (Peru), Tamales (Mexico)).

data.name: Mediterranean
data.value: Mediterranean

data.name: Mediterranean_Description
data.value: Light and healthy meals, typically featuring fresh vegetables, grains, and grilled proteins (e.g., Greek Salad (Greece), Hummus (Lebanon), Falafel (Egypt), Tabbouleh (Lebanon), Fattoush (Lebanon), Grilled Octopus (Greece)).

data.name: MiddleEasternNorthAfrican
data.value: Middle Eastern & North African

data.name: MiddleEasternNorthAfrican_Description
data.value: Rich and aromatic dishes characterized by spices and herbs, often featuring grilled meats and hearty grains (e.g., Shawarma (Lebanon), Couscous (Morocco), Tagine (Algeria), Hummus (Israel), Falafel (Egypt), Kebabs (Turkey)).

data.name: NorthAmerican
data.value: North American

data.name: NorthAmerican_Description
data.value: Comfort foods with a focus on hearty meals, BBQ, and regional specialties (e.g., Burgers (United States), Poutine (Canada), Clam Chowder (United States), BBQ Ribs (United States), Jambalaya (United States), Cornbread (United States)).

data.name: SavorySnacksSmallPlates
data.value: Savory Snacks & Small Plates

data.name: SavorySnacksSmallPlates_Description
data.value: Small, flavorful bites that are perfect for sharing or as appetizers (e.g., Tapas (Spain), Dim Sum (China), Mezze Platter (Middle East), Charcuterie Board (France), Antipasto (Italy), Samosas (India)).

data.name: Seafood
data.value: Seafood

data.name: Seafood_Description
data.value: Dishes focusing on fish and shellfish, celebrated for their freshness and variety (e.g., Ceviche (Peru), Fish Tacos (Mexico), Grilled Salmon (Norway), Lobster Roll (United States), Clam Chowder (United States), Bouillabaisse (France)).

data.name: SpicyFood
data.value: Spicy Food

data.name: SpicyFood_Description
data.value: Dishes known for their heat and robust flavors, appealing to those who enjoy bold tastes (e.g., Spicy Ramen (Japan), Sichuan Hot Pot (China), Spicy Curry (India), Vindaloo (India), Spicy Tacos (Mexico), Kimchi (Korea)).

data.name: StreetFood
data.value: Street Food

data.name: StreetFood_Description
data.value: Casual, flavorful foods that are often sold by vendors and reflect local tastes (e.g., Pani Puri (India), Hot Dogs (United States), Arepas (Venezuela), Churros (Spain), Gyoza (Japan), Spring Rolls (Vietnam)).

data.name: Vegan
data.value: Vegan

data.name: Vegan_Description
data.value: Completely plant-based meals without any animal products, often creative and flavorful (e.g., Vegan Burgers (United States), Tofu Stir-fry (Thailand), Chickpea Salad (Global), Vegan Chili (United States), Vegan Sushi (Japan), Quinoa Salad (Peru)).

data.name: Vegetarian
data.value: Vegetarian

data.name: Vegetarian_Description
data.value: A wide array of plant-based meals, highlighting vegetables, legumes, and grains (e.g., Ratatouille (France), Vegetable Stir-fry (China), Stuffed Peppers (Italy), Caprese Salad (Italy), Lentil Soup (Turkey), Veggie Burger (United States)).
